summary: simple makeup reducer for all 3 female housecarls, because I couldn\'t stand it anymore.
descriptionHtml:
it is a very simple mod that alter face-tint of all female housecarls, to make them look more normal, serious, self respecting, dependable person,  rather than some aging pornstars on budget, or pseudo gaijin geisha wannabees 

it is understandable for skyrim\'s default skin texture, they need to cover a lot of filth with tons of makeup to make them look half presentable for the dragonborn ( in messed up psychedelic 80\'s kind of way).

Luckily they no longer need to hide anything with current face texture mods.
So it is time to grab some sense and some wash cloth to wipe off the crap.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F0rQ4.jpg[/IMG]
But I leave the mascara alone, so stop hatin\' 

in screenshots, obviously I use my own face skin mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5106

but this is not required for this simple mod to function

cheers,
navets
author: navetsea
